data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Kansas City awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 3, Tim Ford awards Houston a goal kick.
Throw-in Kansas City.
Tim Ford signals a free kick to Kansas City just outside Houston's area.
In the minute 6, Corner awarded to Kansas City.
Tim Ford awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Houston in their own half.
In the minute 8, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Houston push upfield but Tim Ford quickly pulls them for offside.
Throw-in for Houston at BBVA Compass Stadium.
In the minute 11, It's a goal kick for the home team in Houston.
Tim Ford signals a Kansas City throw-in in Houston's half.
Kansas City have been awarded a corner by Tim Ford.
In the minute 14, Ball safe as Kansas City is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Houston a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Tim Ford signals a free kick to Houston in their own half.
In the minute 17, Throw-in for Houston in the half of Kansas City.
Houston awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Kansas City in their own half.
In the minute 19, In Houston Houston drive forward through Darwin Quintero. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Corner awarded to Kansas City.
Goal kick for Houston at BBVA Compass Stadium.
In the minute 21, Free kick Houston.
Houston advance rapidly upfield but Tim Ford blows for offside.
Ball safe as Houston is awarded a throw-in in their half.

Throw-in for Kansas City close to the penalty box.
Houston have a goal kick.
In the minute 28, It's a goal kick for the away team in Houston.
Can Kansas City get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Houston's half?
Erik Hurtado is on target to give Kansas City a 0-1 advantage.

Tim Ford signals a Kansas City throw-in in Houston's half.
Throw-in for Houston at BBVA Compass Stadium.
In the minute 34, Tim Ford awards Kansas City a goal kick.
Can Houston get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kansas City's half?
Throw-in Kansas City.
In the minute 35, Kansas City drive upfield and Khiry Shelton gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Houston defender.
Kansas City have been awarded a corner by Tim Ford.
Kansas City have been awarded a corner by Tim Ford.
In the minute 37, Ball goes out of play for a Houston goal kick.
Free kick for Kansas City in the half of Houston.
Free kick for Houston in their own half.

Goal kick for Houston at BBVA Compass Stadium.
Tim Ford awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 43, Houston pushes forward through Maynor Figueroa, whose finish on goal is saved.
Tim Ford signals a free kick to Houston.
Can Houston capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Kansas City's half?

Houston awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Tim Ford signals a free kick to Kansas City in their own half.
In the minute 45, 1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Throw-in for Kansas City in the half of Houston.
Kansas City are pushing forward but Gianluca Busio's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 45, Houston have a goal kick.
The first-half has ended.
The second half has started at BBVA Compass Stadium.
In the minute 46, Kansas City to take a throw-in in Houston territory.
In Houston a free kick has been awarded the home team.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.

Houston are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Tim Ford awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 49, Houston are caught offside.

Throw-in high up the field for Kansas City in Houston.

Throw-in for Houston at BBVA Compass Stadium.

In the minute 56, Free kick for Houston in their own half.
The home team have replaced Niko Hansen with Alberth Elis. This is the first substitution made today by Tab Ramos.
Ariel Lassiter is on a sub for Christian Ramirez for Houston.
Tim Ford signals a throw-in for Houston, close to Kansas City's area.
In the minute 59, Alberth Elis gets an equalizer for Houston. The score is now 1-1.
That's a fine assist from Darwin Ceren.
In the minute 61, Can Kansas City get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Houston's half?
Houston drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Kansas City make their first substitution with Johnny Russell replacing Erik Hurtado.
In the minute 62, The away team replace Felipe Hernandez with Gerso Fernandes.
Free kick for Houston in their own half.
Free kick for Kansas City in the half of Houston.

Darwin Quintero of Houston smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.

Tim Ford awards Houston a goal kick.
Houston awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 68, Free kick Houston.
Houston are coming forward and Memo Rodriguez gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.

In the minute 86, Goal! Houston have taken a 2-1 lead courtesy of a header from Mauro Manotas.
Great play from Zarek Valentin to set up the goal.
Kansas City to take a throw-in in Houston territory.
In the minute 87, Boniek Garcia is replacing Darwin Quintero for the home team.
Throw-in high up the field for Kansas City in Houston.

The match is over. Final score 2-1.
Maynor Figueroa (Houston) has received a yellow card from Tim Ford.
